message: “Pimps and traffickers have a long history of placing girls and women in prostitution at truck stops because they have viewed truckers as potential customers,” Hoffer said. “And that is the primary reason that truckers can be such an important part of the response to prostitution and sex trafficking.”

data.description: Gov. Bruce Rauner could soon enact a law requiring truck drivers to receive training on human trafficking prevention.
data.title: Illinois truck drivers might join fight against human sex trafficking
